item.title: Migration brief
item.author: j@joshix.com (Josh Wood)
item.description:
This is a mostly-migrated version of the once and future joshix.com:

  • Built with Hugo,
  • served by the Caddy web server with automatic Let’s Encrypt TLS and HTTP/2,
  • packaged in a discrete App Container Image (ACI) based on caddybox,
  • executed by the rkt container engine,
  • running on CoreOS Linux.

TODO:

  • [x] Use rkt instead of docker.
  • [ ] Cluster-ify with K8s and “rktnetes”

To be continued…

item.title: Projects
item.author: j@joshix.com (Josh Wood)
item.description:
Containers &c.

  • Caddybox: The Caddy web server in a container (ACI or Docker)
  • Jxnu: Source and scripts to build this site. Joshix.com is deployed as an application container based on Caddybox, plus a tree of HTML files generated from Markdown by Hugo.

Plan 9

  • Discount: Plan 9 build support and documentation for David Parsons’s Discount, a compiler for the Markdown formatting syntax. Source for Discount and for my fork for Plan 9 build maintenance is available on GitHub.
  • Mb (neé µb): Plan 9 tools for Twitter/StatusNet microblogging
  • See also /n/sources/contrib/josh/

Penicillin farm: Old code covered in mold

Carefully neglected to various stages of decomposition.

Microformats

  • Simplish: WordPress theme, implementing Microformats nearly everywhere
  • Sp: Habari theme, simpler sibling of Simplish

Mobile

  • Identilion: iPhone µblog app for Twitter-like APIs
